description: This file is a shell script utils file for crash upload operations on broadband devices. It includes functions for retrieving system information such as last modified time of files, CPU core type, interface name, MAC address, network status, system uptime, SHA1 checksum, and model information specific to device types. The script also sources other utility scripts if available.

methods.name: getLastModifiedTimeOfFile
methods.description: Retrieves the last modified timestamp of a specified file, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD-HH-MM-SS.

methods.name: get_core_value
methods.description: Detects and returns the core type of the device's CPU (ATOM or ARM) based on system files and CPU info.

methods.name: get_interface_value
methods.description: Determines the network interface name based on device type and CPU core.

methods.name: get_mac_address
methods.description: Retrieves the MAC address associated with a given network interface, with special handling based on device core.

methods.name: getMacAddressOnly
methods.description: Obtains the MAC address of the device's primary network interface.

methods.name: network_commn_status
methods.description: Checks the network status and IP configuration of the device, waiting until ready.

methods.name: getSHA1
methods.description: Calculates the SHA1 checksum of a specified file.

methods.name: Uptime
methods.description: Returns the system uptime in seconds.

methods.name: get_model_value
methods.description: Retrieves the device model information based on core type.

methods.name: getModel
methods.description: Obtains the device’s model number from version information.
